item.description:
We hold these truths to be self evident:

Fires don't bring down steel-frame buildings.

Real suicide hijackers don't turn up alive.

A third tower (WTC 7) collapsed on 9/11.

Some crazy conspiracy theorists say that 19 men directed from a cave in Afghanistan were able to hijack 4 planes simultaneously, fly around the northeast corridor for 90 minutes without a fighter response and crash 2 planes into 2 World Trade Center towers in New York City - causing 3 towers to collapse - all on the say so of a lying government that directly benefited and a servant media owned by a handful of corporations who all told us Iraq had weapons of mass destruction.

Don't be fooled! Learn the truth! Save our republic!

Facts you might not know:

No steel frame building has ever collapsed due to fire, before 9/11 or since.

Since 1957, NORAD has had 100% success intercepting errant airlines in minutes.

WTC 7 had minimal damage and a few small fires but collapsed into its own footprint at free-fall speed.

Jet fuel burns at <1800 F, steel melts at 2800 F, and molten steel was seen on 9/11 and months after.

Bush is an idiot. How could he do this? Why?

You're right. Bush is an idiot. He's just a puppet. From all indications he didn't know what was going to happen that day, though he did go along with it shortly thereafter.

The real rulers of this country committed this act of treason (and many other crimes) in order to wage a "clash of civilizations" and an endless war of domination against those nations not already under their control and to create a police state for the American people.

The terrorists hate us for our freedoms? No. The Taliban ("Al Qaeda") was created to wage war against the Soviets in the 1980s and have done yeomen's work for the empire ever since.

9/11 provided the pretext for the boys in "The Project for a New American Century" (PNAC) and their controllers to attack any country they claim have dangerous weapons and might attack "the Homeland".

We The People need to awaken from this nightmare before they attack us again for another round of wars and increasing totalitarianism.

Stop being a "good" Democrat.
Stop being a "good" Republican.

Start being a good American.

Defend our Constitution from all enemies, foreign and domestic!

The Boston 9/11 Truth Film Festival

See "911 Mysteries" and more on a big screen.

February 9th-11th at The Democracy Center, 45 Mount Auburn Street, Cambridge MA 02138.

Friday 6pm-12am
Saturday 12pm-12am
Sunday 12pm-8pm

Boston 9/11 Truth

Boston Sons of Liberty

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth
